text: The 1999 Billboard Music Awards ceremony, presented by Billboard, honored the best musics of 1999 and the chart toppers of the year from December 1998 to December 1999 and took place on December 8, 1999, at the MGM Grand Garden Arena, Las Vegas. == Winners and nominees == === Awards === Winners are listed first, highlighted in boldface, and indicated with a dagger () {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Century Award ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Artist Achievement Award |- | valign="top" | * Emmylou Harris | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| * Aerosmith |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Male Artist of the Decade ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Female Artist of the Decade |- | valign="top" | * Garth Brooks | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| * Mariah Carey |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Artist of the Year ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top New Artist |- | valign="top" | * Backstreet Boys ** Britney Spears ** TLC ** Shania Twain | style="vertical- align:top; width:50%;"| * Britney Spears ** Christina Aguilera ** Lou Bega ** Jennifer Lopez |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Male Artist ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Female Artist |- | valign="top" | * Ricky Martin ** Jay-Z ** R. Kelly ** DMX | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| * Britney Spears ** Whitney Houston ** Cher ** Shania Twain |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Billboard 200 Artist ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Billboard 200 Album |- | valign="top" | * Backstreet Boys ** Britney Spears ** TLC ** Shania Twain | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| * Backstreet Boys – Millennium ** Britney Spears – ...Baby One More Time ** Shania Twain – Come on Over ** 'N SYNC - NSYNC |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Female Singles Artist of the Year ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Female Albums Artist of the Year |- | valign="top" | * "...Baby One More Time" - Britney Spears | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| * Britney Spears – ...Baby One More Time |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Duo/Group ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Hot 100 Song |- | valign="top" | * Backstreet Boys ** 98 Degrees ** Sugar Ray ** TLC | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| * "Believe" - Cher ** "Heartbreak Hotel" - Whitney Houston (feat. Faith Evans and Kelly Price) ** "Angel of Mine" - Monica ** "No Scrubs" - TLC |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Male Hot 100 Artist of the Year ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Female Hot 100 Artist of the Year |- | valign="top" | * Ricky Martin ** R. Kelly ** Jay-Z ** Tim McGraw | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| * Britney Spears ** Cher ** Brandy Norwood ** Whitney Houston |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top R&B;/Hip Hop Artist ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top R&B; Album Artist of the Year |- | valign="top" | * R. Kelly ** Jay-Z ** Faith Evans ** Lauryn Hill | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| * Flesh of My Flesh, Blood of My Blood - DMX ** 400 Degreez - Juvenile ** The Miseducation of Lauryn Hill - Lauryn Hill ** R. - R. Kelly |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top R&B; Album of the Year ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top R&B; Single of the Year |- | valign="top" | * 400 Degreez - Juvenile ** Flesh of My Flesh, Blood of My Blood - DMX ** The Miseducation of Lauryn Hill - Lauryn Hill ** R. - R. Kelly | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| * "Fortunate" - Maxwell ** "Heartbreak Hotel" - Whitney Houston (feat. Faith Evans and Kelly Price) ** "No Scrubs" - TLC ** "Nobody's Supposed to Be Here" - Deborah Cox |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Rap Artist ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Rap Single |- | valign="top" | * Jay-Z ** Busta Rhymes ** JT Money ** Solé | style="vertical- align:top; width:50%;"| * "Who Dat" - JT Money featuring Solé ** "What's It Gonna Be?!" - Busta Rhymes (feat. Bone Thugs-N-Harmony) |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Country Artist of the Year ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Country Album of the Year |- | valign="top" | * Dixie Chicks ** Tim McGraw ** Martina McBride ** George Strait | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| * Wide Open Spaces - Dixie Chicks |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Country Group/Duo of the Year ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Adult Contemporary Track Of The Year |- | valign="top" | * Dixie Chicks | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| * "Angel" - Sarah McLachlan |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Rock Artist of the Year ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Rock Single of the Year |- | valign="top" | * Creed ** Metallica ** Lenny Kravitz ** Collective Soul | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| * "One" - Creed ** "Heavy" - Collective Soul ** "Scar Tissue" - Red Hot Chili Peppers ** "What It's Like" - Everlast |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Modern Rock Artist ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Modern Rock Track |- | valign="top" | * The Offspring | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| * "My Own Worst Enemy" - Lit |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Catalog Artist of the Year ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Top Catalog Album of the Year |- | valign="top" | * Metallica | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| * Metallica - Metallica |} === Artist with multiple nominations and awards === {| class="wikitable" rowspan=2 border=2 style="text-align:center;" |+ Artist that received multiple nomination |- ! scope="col"|Nominations ! scope="col"|Artist |- |8 |Britney Spears |- |6 |TLC |- |rowspan="2"|5 |R.
